meta.name: Neven's Christmas in Limerick
meta.description: Neven explores the food and culture of this historic city and prepares some of his own favourite recipes for Christmas.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: In the second of this new two-part special, Neven Maguire prepares Saffron Orzo with Mussels Nduja, Slow Roasted Shoulder of Lamb and Bulgar Wheat; & Cinnamon and Mincemeat Swirls.
